verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the fifteenth <S%G4003><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> of the reign <S%G2231><s%> of Tiberius <S%G5086><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%>, Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> being governor <S%G2230><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> being tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of the region <S%G5561><s%> of Ituraea <S%G2484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Trachonitis <S%G5139><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Lysanias <S%G3078><s%> tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of Abilene <S%G9><s%>,

in <S%G1909><s%> the high-priesthood <S%G749><s%> of Annas <S%G452><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%>, the word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the region round about <S%G4066><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%>, preaching <S%G2784><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>;

as <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of the words <S%G3056><s%> of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, The <S%G3004><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, Make ye <S%G2090><s%> ready the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Make <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight <S%G2117><s%>.

Every <S%G3956><s%> valley <S%G5327><s%> shall be filled <S%G4137><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hill <S%G1015><s%> shall be brought low <S%G5013><s%>; And <S%G2532><s%> the crooked <S%G4646><s%> shall become <S%G2071><s%> straight <S%G2117><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> the rough <S%G5138><s%> ways3598, 1519 smooth <S%G3006><s%>;
And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> shall see <S%G3700><s%> the salvation <S%G4992><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

He <S%G3004><s%> said therefore <S%G3767><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> that went out <S%G1607><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Ye offspring <S%G1081><s%> of vipers <S%G2191><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> warned <S%G5263><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> to flee <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come <S%G3195><s%>?

Bring forth <S%G4160><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> begin <S%G756><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, We have <S%G2192><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> to <S%G3962><s%> our father <S%G3962><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> to raise up <S%G1453><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> unto Abraham <S%G11><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> even now <S%G2235><s%> the axe <S%G513><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> lieth <S%G2749><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> of the trees <S%G1186><s%>: every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that bringeth <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is hewn down <S%G1581><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire <S%G4442><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> must we do <S%G4160><s%>?

And he answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, He that hath <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> coats <S%G5509><s%>, let him impart <S%G3330><s%> to him that hath <S%G2192><s%> none <S%G3361><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he that hath <S%G2192><s%> food <S%G1033><s%>, let him do <S%G4160><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%>.

And there <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Teacher <S%G1320><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> must we do <S%G4160><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Extort <S%G4238><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> that which is appointed <S%G1299><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> soldiers <S%G4754><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> must <S%G4160><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> do <S%G4160><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Extort from <S%G1286><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> by violence <S%G3366><s%>, neither accuse <S%G4811><s%> any one wrongfully <S%G4811><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> be content <S%G714><s%> with <S%G3800><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> wages <S%G3800><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as the people <S%G2992><s%> were in <S%G1722><s%> expectation <S%G4328><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all men <S%G3956><s%> reasoned <S%G1260><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, whether <S%G3379><s%> haply he <S%G846><s%> were <S%G1498><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G537><s%> them all <S%G537><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with water <S%G5204><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> there cometh <S%G2064><s%> he that is <S%G3450><s%> mightier than <S%G2478><s%> I <S%G846><s%>, the latchet <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G3739><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> I <S%G846><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> to unloose <S%G3089><s%>: he <S%G846><s%> shall baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in fire <S%G4442><s%>:

whose <S%G3739><s%> fan <S%G4425><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, thoroughly to cleanse <S%G1245><s%> his <S%G846><s%> threshing-floor <S%G257><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to gather <S%G4863><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> garner <S%G596><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the chaff <S%G892><s%> he will burn <S%G2618><s%> up with unquenchable <S%G762><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.
With <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other exhortations <S%G3870><s%> therefore preached he <S%G2097><s%> good tidings <S%G2087><s%> unto the people <S%G2992><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5076><s%>, being reproved <S%G1651><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> Herodias <S%G2266><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>'s <S%G5376><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%>,

added <S%G4369><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%>, that <S%G2532><s%> he shut up <S%G2623><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, when <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%>, that <S%G2424><s%>, Jesus also <S%G2532><s%> having been baptized <S%G907><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%>, the heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> in a bodily <S%G4984><s%> form <S%G1491><s%>, as <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%>, upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>, <S%G3004><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>; in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> I am well pleased <S%G2106><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> himself <S%G846><s%>, when he began <S%G756><s%> to teach <S%G5616><s%>, was about thirty <S%G5144><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> of age <S%G2094><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> (as <S%G5613><s%> was <S%G2242><s%> supposed <S%G3543><s%>) of Joseph <S%G2501><s%>, the son of Heli <S%G2242><s%>,
the son of Matthat <S%G3158><s%>, the son of Levi <S%G3017><s%>, the son of Melchi <S%G3197><s%>, the son of Jannai <S%G2388><s%>, the son of Joseph <S%G2501><s%>,

the son of Jacob <S%G2384><s%>, the son of Isaac <S%G2464><s%>, the son of Abraham <S%G11><s%>, the son of Terah <S%G2291><s%>, the son of Nahor <S%G3493><s%>,

the son of Enos <S%G1800><s%>, the son of Seth <S%G4589><s%>, the son of Adam <S%G76><s%>, the son of God <S%G2316><s%>.
